name: Origin Pulse
effect:
Inflicts Wounds. -1 Accuracy. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 6, but it's reduced accuracy to 2.
 At Gold Rank, change this move's accuracy to Special
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 9, but it's reduced accuracy to 3.
 At Diamond Rank, this move can hit two secondary targets for half (rounded up) damage.
description: The Pokemon sends a giant pulse underwater that creates a chain reaction and causes water to move in large streams. It is believed that all water in the sea moves thanks to this.
